name: ProposalSpace
overview:
The more efficient and affordable way to manage abstracts online.

Mission

To make it as simple as possible for anyone to collect, review and select proposals online.

Company Overview

ProposalSpace is the only online abstract management system that puts users in complete control of the entire abstract management process. From designing the submission form to sending out selection notices, everything needed is right at the user’s fingertips.

Description

With ProposalSpace, you can: -Get started in minutes, not weeks -Improve quality with complete control over every aspect of the call -Control your with pricing a fraction of the cost of traditional abstract management systems -Expand the reach of the call to the large audience of our open network -Avoid IT headaches -Pay as you go
